long_description: Adorned with the Ritchey logo, this helmet liner keeps sweat out of your eyes so you can focus on the prize. CoolMax(R) polyester technical fabric offers the softness of cotton, a light weight and moisture-wicking properties. KoolFit(R) elastic sweatband keeps cap in place and keeps sweat out of your eyes. Three-panel dome construction fits easily under helmets; adjustable elastic drawcord secures fit. Sublimated graphics are brilliantly bold yet do not inhibit breathability. One size fits all.
short_description: Adorned with the Ritchey logo, this helmet liner keeps sweat out of your eyes so you can focus on the prize.
